body.p: ∏ is a complete Smalltalk development environment that includes a rich class library and a powerful arsenal of tools.

The ∏ environment is comprised of a portable Smalltalk virtual image (usually called an image file), that is run by a platform-specific virtual machine. The standard distribution image of ∏ is sometimes referred to as the base image. As you develop applications using ∏, you generally save your work in your own copies of the image file.
∏ includes a number of tools for managing the image file, the user interface settings (e.g., themes, key bindings, etc.) you prefer, for managing code changes, code components, and more.
